head.title: Treasury Bills Set For This Week

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Banking, Finance and Insurance

hedline.hl1: Treasury Bills Set For This Week
hedline.hl2: Treasury Bills Set for This Week

block.p: The Treasury's schedule of financing this week includes the regular weekly auction of new three- and six-month bills and a seven-day cash management bill, an auction of four-week bills and a five-year note tomorrow and a 10-year note on Thursday.

At the close of the New York cash market on Friday, the rate on the outstanding three-month bill was 1.64 percent. The rate on the six-month issue was 1.86 percent, and the rate on the four-week issue was 1.48 percent. In when-issued trading, the five-year note was being offered at a price to yield 3.52 percent, while the 10-year issue was offered at a price to yield 4.29 percent.

The Treasury's schedule of financing this week includes the regular weekly auction of new three- and six-month bills and a seven-day cash management bill, an auction of four-week bills and a five-year note tomorrow and a 10-year note on Thursday.

The Treasury's schedule of financing this week includes the regular weekly auction of new three- and six-month bills and a seven-day cash management bill, an auction of four-week bills and a five-year note tomorrow and a 10-year note on Thursday.

At the close of the New York cash market on Friday, the rate on the outstanding three-month bill was 1.64 percent. The rate on the six-month issue was 1.86 percent, and the rate on the four-week issue was 1.48 percent. In when-issued trading, the five-year note was being offered at a price to yield 3.52 percent, while the 10-year issue was offered at a price to yield 4.29 percent.
The following tax-exempt fixed-income issues are scheduled for pricing this week:
California, $500 million of general obligation bonds. Competitive.
TAX EXEMPT ONE DAY DURING THE WEEK
Highline School District 401, Burien, Wash., $71.5 million of general obligation improvement and refunding bonds. Lehman Brothers.
Jacksonville, Fla., Electric Authority, $130 million of debt securities. Citigroup Global Markets.
Maine Municipal Bond Bank, $15 million of debt securities. UBS.
Massachusetts Housing Finance Agency, $79.5 million of debt securities. Lehman Brothers.
Ohio Higher Education, $150 million of general obligation bonds. J.P. Morgan Securities.
South Dakota Housing, $60 million of debt securities. Citigroup Global Markets.
